page.title: 05LAND USE
page.content: Most of the land in the area is used for agricultural purposes.Very little land is used to grow crops most of it being used to support cattle both beef and dairy though the majority of farms keep a few sheep too. Some farmers tend to specialize and rear pedigree herds of cattle e.g. Skitby Farm has a herd of Limousin Beef Cattle while Stoneflatts has a herd of Friesian Dairy cows. Some farms like Brownrigg are truly mixed having a mixture of animals including dairy and beef cattle,sheep, poultry of various breeds and horses. Those who do grow crops usually grow winter feed for their own animals including hay, silage, barley, potatoes and turnips.
